commenter_a: Please do some research. What does your state actually offer in the way of public assistance to noncitizens? In California noncitizens are not eligible to cash assistance or Calfresh (foodstamps). No Social Security or Medicare without legal residency. So just what are you haters talking about? I hope none of you ever find yourselves in a financial situation which would drive you away from your home in order to survive. I hope you don't call yourself 'Christians' because you are so far from the core of that belief.
